install.name: IttBooks Email Management
install.author: Levi@MangoTreeMedia.com
install.description: No payment, and customized email triggers.

param.name: admingroups
param.label: Manager Groups
param.description: Select the usergroups that are allowed to approve orders.

param.name: approvalcategory
param.label: Category Requiring Approval
param.description: Select the category that requires manager approval to order.

param.name: status1
param.label: Status1
param.description: Send an email when the status of an order is changed to this value

param.name: email1
param.label: Email Recipient1
param.description: Email address(es) to send the status change email to. If you want to send it to multiple addresses, separate them by commas.

param.name: subject1
param.label: Email Subject1
param.description: Subject for the status change email.

param.name: message1
param.label: Email Message1
param.description: Text for the email message. The following variables will be substituted in the email: {PERSON_ID}, {ORDER_ID}, {STATUS}, {ORDER_LINK}
